title: 과거완료 기본 (선행/완료)
intent: 과거의 두 시점을 구분하여 먼저 일어난 일을 과거완료로 표현한다.
lexset: already, just, never, ever, before, after, until, since, by the time, finished

seeds.kr: 그가 도착했을 때 이미 회의가 끝나 있었습니다.
seeds.en: The meeting had already finished when he arrived.
I had bought tickets before the movie started.

seeds.kr: 그들은 전에 그곳에 가본 적이 없었습니다.
seeds.en: They had never been there before.

seeds.kr: 숙제를 다 했을 때 친구가 전화했어요.
seeds.en: My friend called when I had finished homework.
She said she had already had dinner.
I went out after the rain had stopped.
I had completed everything by 10 o'clock.
Had you read that book before?

seeds.kr: 우리가 도착했을 때 그들은 이미 떠났어요.
seeds.en: They had already left when we arrived.

seeds.kr: 그는 전에 그런 경험을 해본 적이 없었습니다.
seeds.en: He had never experienced that before.
